mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_idx, userinfo_id, pack_idx) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userinfoId}, #{packIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_idx as cartIdx, c.userinfo_id as userinfoId, c.pack_idx as packIdx, p.pack_title as packTitle, c.pack_adultcount as packAdultcount, c.pack_childcount as packChildcount, (c.pack_adultcount * p.pack_adultprice + c.pack_childcount * p.pack_childprice) as money FROM cart c, pack p, userinfo u WHERE u.id = c.userinfo_id AND p.pack_idx = c.pack_idx AND c.userinfo_id = #{userinfoId} ORDER BY c.cart_idx
SELECT NVL(SUM(c.pack_adultcount * p.pack_adultprice + c.pack_childcount * p.pack_childprice), 0) as money FROM cart c JOIN pack p ON c.pack_idx = p.pack_idx WHERE c.userinfo_id = #{userinfoId}
